"Colossal Mutants":
"Colossal Mutants are special enemies which only appear during specific periods.

In certain Exploration Sections, defeating Dread Enemies that appear near markers may cause Colossal Mutants to appear."

"Current target Sections (Until 3-JUL-2024, 11:00 JST):
Central Retem/Western Retem/Northern Retem/Southern Retem
